item.title: CVE-2024-30553|2024-03-31T19:52:08.385Z -- Joby Joseph -- WP Twitter Mega Fan Box Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Joby Joseph WP Twitter Mega Fan Box Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Twitter Mega Fan Box Widget : from n/a through 1.0.
